full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGA' LDAN PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO'I SMON TSIG DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DGA' LDAN PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO'I LAM GYI GNAD LAS BRTZAMS PA'I SMON LAM RGYUN DU KHA 'DON BYAS CHOG PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG 'GOS ZHES DAD LDAN SKYED SPUG CHOS MDZAD DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG RNAM RGYAL GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DBEN GNAS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG DGA' LDAN SNYAN BRGYUD KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I PHYOGS DUS KUN DU 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
